text: being part of pivotal made me realize
that a company which gets to thousands
of employees can successfully combine
people process and Technology while

what would you say was the reason behind

I think the the key to successful growth
is really having a very intense highly
intensive
collaboration among all the people that
that work at a company
and when I say that I'm framing it
abstractly but I am primarily talking
about
our practice of pairing wherever
possible and because you're you're
really asking how do you keep a
consistent culture as you grow and as
you get to scale how does that happen
and we certainly see many companies
working on trying to have a corporate
Culture by doing off sites and
activities designed to help people bond
together and it always struck me that
well if your workplace was oriented
around that
why would you need to go somewhere else
in other words what are you doing at
work all day if you're not bonding and
trusting each other and relying on each
other and getting to know each other you
know sort of as as that company
Community why do you need to go away and
go somewhere else to do that it seems
like work is not that then by
implication and it's not that we're

something like that I've always I've
always kind of felt that notion that
sometimes companies will will put

think people have families and Community

there should be such a level of
